review: We spent three nights here and enjoyed the location, close enough to Rishikesh and Haridwar to do things but able to escape and relax in nature. This is a basic hotel but a great deal for the price point. They provided us with different meals, gave good recommendations for day activities and prepared bonfires at night. Clean rooms and very attentive service.
name: zigeumac

review: Great experience while staying here we enjoy the stay and Jungle safari too  Very peaceful place. We have enjoy the Food in Rajaji Retreat very taste and Yummy food available here. We visited in Varindvasani Buffer Jon and Kimsar Jon area. Beautiful place for elephants sighting and many type of birds.   Thanks Mr. Mohit Sharma and Mr. Rohit Sharma owner of Rajaji Retreat Chila...........
name: Amit S

review: The Rajaji Retreat Best Place To Hangout With Friends And Family. It Was Awesome Place..Peaceful Nature And Mindblowing Side Views,Great Staff Helps You To Make It More Joyfull... I Visit Here With My Family Group Of 12 People From Dehradun We Are Happy To Have An Adventure Trip & Raja ji Tiger safari With Rajaji Retreat  THANKS Rajaji  ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
name: Vipin

review: It was awesome trip . We had amazing stay at raja ji retreat and morning Safari was adventures , memorable for my entire life . I suggest to everyone to be the part or this kind of adventures things in your life
name: Wonderingsoul

review: I visited wid my family on 30 June.. was impressed by beauty of place and to make it a superb stay we were served delicious food...Adjacent village is very good..their services and behave was very pleasant..rooms are very nice and clean
name: Tulsi bisht
